SENT.plain: Long-term favourable effects of a treatment with both cyclosporin A and coumarin in a 35 year old Caucasian female patient with BehÃ§et's disease, presenting with haemoptysis caused by pulmonary thromboemboli and a single major pulmonary artery aneurysm, are reported
All disease activity and complications were well controlled during 9 years of follow-up
